name: Critical Slash
description:
Loot based game with hundreds of different items with different rarities.

Endless level progression system!

Play offline or connect online to compete in various leaderboards with people around the world!

Explore a procedurally generated world with tons of enemies, treasure, and secrets!

Vast exploration, intense battles, and awesome gear and loot!

Everything created by one man -- me, the developer.

Plenty of updates!
